name: Out Of Control (Superbun)
description:
An Asteroids clone made by Superbun.

It's Asteroids, but your engine is stuck on and constantly growing more powerful. Collecting ice crystals from broken 'roids will cool your engine and slow your acceleration, but also reduce your score multiplier. Survive as long as you can and rack up those points, but don't lose control!

Credits:

Development: Superbun
